channel.title: Ken and Cassie Tussey on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Ken and Cassie Tussey on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – July 21, 2019
item.description: Skipped church, slept until 8, kids 10. Called to make Dillan come home after lunch. Kids played inside/out, lots of fighting, made tent in Ashley’s room. Emma’s birthday swim party at John Lowery, kids had fun: rock wall, slide, diving boards; cut short by storm. Nice cool down!

item.title: Status Update – July 10, 2019
item.description: Daycare and work. Lesa picked up boys, I picked up Ashley from Emma’s. She obviously had fun, was extremely tired, a total wreck. When she got home she tried to crash, made her take shower, opted to skip dinner, went to bed. Boys played, Dillan followed me on bike as I cut grass.

item.title: Status Update – July 9, 2019
item.description: Daycare and Mitchell Pool, Dillan accidentally squirted some boys, they retaliated, kids all up in arms over it. Lesa picked up kids, I had doctor appointment. Dillan had Boy Scout meeting, they retired a flag. Ashley spending night at Emma’s, called us to say goodnight and pray.

item.title: Status Update – June 17, 2019
item.description: Big fight with Ashley, can’t undo words. Kids at daycare. Rained all day. Picked up kids, Lesa had dinner ready and waiting so kids could go to VBS. Bruce and Ashley acted out, wouldn’t listen, got their attention by threatening VBS, fireworks and tears! Relented. Met Emma there.

item.title: Status Update – June 9, 2019
item.description: Lead in back, roaming security, Emma went to church with us, I think she had good time, dropped her off on our way home. Ashley worn out, girls up until 1:00am. Tried to nap, got 30-45 minutes in. Rainy afternoon, stormy evening. TV out, Youth Group canceled. Kids in bed on time!

item.title: Status Update – June 8, 2019
item.description: Took Ashley to piano lesson, we cleaned deck and house while Lesa got cookout supplies. Went to Western Skateland to roller skate, kids had a blast, Lesa skated too. Ken and Cassie Tussey came over for cook out, Emma spending night with Ashley, Emma’s first sleepover. A good day.

item.title: Status Update – May 27, 2019
item.description: Went to see about house plans, think we’ll build. Stopped at Ken and Cassie Tussey’s, invited Emma to spend night in a couple of weeks, hay for rabbits. Worked on hutch with Ashley, didn’t finish. Kids played on trampoline at Lexi’s. Took kids to ride bikes in school parking lot.
